CONTENTS.P: Project name Main Roads Rehabilitation Project
Country Montenegro
Business sector Transport
Project ID 20170211
Funding source European Investment Bank
Type of contract Project goods, works and services
Type of notice General Procurement Notices
Issue date April 2018

The Ministry of Transport and Maritime Affairs intends using the proceeds of a loan from the European Investment Bank (“the Bank”) to undertake financing of the reconstruction of selected sections of main roads located throughout Montenegro. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of approximately EUR 96 million, will require the procurement of the following works and services:
— Rehabilitation of M-8 road from Pljevlja to Mihajlovica border,
— Rehabilitation of M-21 road Barski Most -Dobrakovo border-Bijelo Polje,
— Rehabilitation and upgrade of M-2 and M-2.4 road Kamenovo — Petrovac- Bar,
— Rehabilitation of M-2 road Lepenac-Ribarevine-Poda — Berane,
— Rehabilitation of M-2 Berane-Tunnel Lokve-Rožaje; and,
— Consulting services for works supervision of the M-2, M-21 and M-18 rehabilitations and upgrade.

Tendering for the civil works on rehabilitation is expected in the second and the third quarter of 2018 whereas tendering for the consulting services contract is expected to be launched in the second quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loan from the Bank, will be ordered, purchased and secured by open national or international tender or other acceptable procurement procedure complying, to the Bank’s satisfaction, with its policy as described in its Guide to Procurement in force at the date of this publication. The proceeds of the Bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law or official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
All firms are invited to participate in the tenders.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ATTENTION: Mr Mile Ostojić, Mrs Milica Dubljević
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Ministry of Transport and Maritime Affairs, Transport Directorate
